name: Attack of the Mutant Camels 2: Yak Attack
name_original: Attack of the Mutant Camels 2: Yak Attack
description:
Attack of the Mutant Camels 2: Yak Attack is an arcade game developed by Nelefa Production. It came out on 01-01-2000. RetroSpec published the game.
You can play Attack of the Mutant Camels 2: Yak Attack on PC.
